about_the_game:
This DLC features a full PDF copy of Beyond the Western Deep: Volume Two, containing over 120 pages of content that continues the story of Quinlan and Dakkan from Wintersdawn in the Deep as they discover treachery in their midst and come face-to-face with the forces that threaten to drive their world to war.

Includes an expanded behind-the-scenes extras section with special guest artwork and sketches by main series artist Rachel Bennett.
detailed_description:
This DLC features a full PDF copy of Beyond the Western Deep: Volume Two, containing over 120 pages of content that continues the story of Quinlan and Dakkan from Wintersdawn in the Deep as they discover treachery in their midst and come face-to-face with the forces that threaten to drive their world to war.

Includes an expanded behind-the-scenes extras section with special guest artwork and sketches by main series artist Rachel Bennett.
